subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous king of Rajasthan built the Amber Fort?
question_hi: राजस्थान के पसंदीदा राजधानी यहां किस राज्य के बीमा विभाग का बना।
explanation_en: Prince Sawai Man Singh I, also known as Sawai Man Singh II, is famous for building the Amer Fort in Jaipur, Rajasthan. He was a general of the Mughal Emperor Akbar and later became the ruler of Jaipur after the death of Emperor Akbar. The Amer Fort, also known as Amer Fort, is a part of the Rajasthan's heritage and attracts tourists from all over the world.
